select sm.id,sm.title,sm.content,sm.send_date,sm.type, (case su1.actual_name is null when true then '系统自动提醒' ELSE su1.actual_name end) as sender_name, ur.name as receiver_account_name,ss.send_status from user_resident as ur,sys_sending as ss,sys_message as sm LEFT JOIN sys_user as su1 on sm.sender = su1.id

and sm.title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and sm.type = #{type}
